org.reroutlab.code.auav.drivers

Class BatteryDriver

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.reroutlab.code.auav.drivers.AuavDrivers
      • org.reroutlab.code.auav.drivers.BatteryDriver

  • public class BatteryDriver
extends AuavDrivers
    BatteryDriver connects to DJI and local compute. It supports commands related to checking battery statuses. Interact with this driver via CoAP (californium)
    URL: coap:\\localhost:port\cr?
    Example: coap:\\127.0.0.1:10452\cr?dc=dji
    Note: all AUAV drivers have resource component "cr" for coap resource
    Since:
    2017-05-01
